title: Spice Girls announce plans to explore 'new opportunities together'
text:
Spice Girls announce plans to explore 'new opportunities together' 12:10am IST - 01:00 
British pop-music girl band, the Spice Girls who topped the charts in the nineties, announced that they will be regrouping. Pascale Davies reports.
